sentences.sentence: Their feet will trample on the dead bodies of their perfidious aggressors.
sentences.translation: 他们将从背信弃义的侵略者的尸体上踏过。

sentences.sentence: Perfidious media managers; treachery in the name of truth.
sentences.translation: 背信弃义的媒体；打着真相名义的背信弃义。

sentences.sentence: No wonder they talk about perfidious Albion, he mutters, and you can see why.
sentences.translation: 他低声嘀咕着，难怪他们都说英国人背信弃义，现在知道为什么了。
